snippet: Extra police officers on Chicago’s streets were not enough to quell a long weekend of violence that ended with 14 people shot to death and dozens more injured.
abstract: Fourteen people are shot to death and dozens more are injured on Chicago's streets over Fourth of July weekend.
lead_paragraph: Extra police officers on Chicago’s streets were not enough to quell a long weekend of violence that ended with 14 people shot to death and dozens more injured.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Tallies 14 Dead in Holiday Weekend Shootings
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago Tallies 14 Dead in Holiday Weekend Shootings
